meanings.sent1: The room was devoid of any furniture.
meanings.sent2: Her story was devoid of any truth.
meanings.sent3: The party was devoid of music, making it a silent affair.
meanings.sent4: His heart felt devoid of all emotion, like an empty vessel.
meanings.sent5: The garden was devoid of color, appearing dull and lifeless.

meanings.sent1: The old house was devoid of any inhabitants.
meanings.sent2: The barren land was devoid of vegetation.
meanings.sent3: The fridge was devoid of any food, causing a hungry dilemma.
meanings.sent4: The night sky was devoid of stars, shrouded in darkness.
meanings.sent5: The library was devoid of books, looking strangely empty.
